name: Aftershock (itch) (OutbackPlague)
description:
Aftershock

Aftershock is a Platforming-Collectathon-Shooter that utilizes rocket jumping, which is set in a minimalist gothic world. Get to the end of the memory, while trying to collect all the Fragments and Relics you can.

Controls

WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
Left Mouse  - Shoot
Space  - Jump
Left Shift - Air Dash
R - Respawn
F - Use (when prompted)

Info

Dev best Speedrun time 1:11:34 (Any%)

Created by Travis Avery @OutbackPlague

Music Credits
